name: podamShouldHandleShortValuesWithThePodamShortValueAnnotation

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.ShortValuePojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the value 0 should be greater or equal than 0
Then the short value 28 should be lower or equal than 100
Then the short value 95 should be between 0 and 1000
Then the Object should not be null
Then the value 0 should be greater or equal than 0
Then the Object should not be null
Then the short value 9 should be lower or equal than 100
Then the Object should not be null
Then the short value 13 should be between 0 and 100
Then the short value 17 should be precisely 17

title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped short values with @PodamShortValue annotation
